item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 32,take NH112 west,make left onto NH118,make right onto Ravine Lodge Road.Park at the end of the road in front of Dartmouth's Ravine Lodge.We can meet at the turnaround by the lodge.We will be hiking on the Gorge Brook Trail to the summit of Mount Moosilauke (4802').Views in all directions from the bald summit. 6.2 miles round trip, 7 hours estimated time.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MODERATE HIKE-MOUNT MOOSILAUKE
